Judul: NON PERFORMING LOAN (NPL) IN INDONESIAN BANKING INDUSTRY YEAR 2003-2008
Abstrak: As one of the alternative financing to company, loan is prominent alternative for expanding the business or established new business with limited capital. Bank provide loan with certain interest rate that should payback by the debtor. But sometimes the debtors can not payback the loan to bank because of some reasons that relate with macroeconomics factors, and then it will be the non performing loan (NPL) for bank.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Achmad Herlanto Anggono, MBA.
Kata Kunci: NPL, Inflation, BI Rate, Money Supply (M2), Rupiah Exchange Rate, Economic Sectors
